attributes.action: Make it madatory for MPs expenses to be met from local party funds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to regulate MP's expense claims, make it mandatory for individual MP's to reclaim ALL expenses from political party offices located in the constiuencies they represent.

In this way political parties at grass roots level rather than the nation as a whole will be required to find funding for expenses. This would surely mean each MP would be held accountable to the electorate that they represent. 

Public funds would then not be open to abuse in the future.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
